All wallpapers have been stopped and settings have been reset to default.

Your original wallpaper has been restored.

qustions.confirm_reset_dia:
Are you sure you want to reset?

This will stop all current wallpapers and restore the original wallpaper.
qustions.confirm_exit_dialog:
Are you sure you want to exit Tapeciarnia?

This will stop all wallpapers and background processes.
qustions.confirm_wallpaper_change_message: Do you want to set the wallpaper from this URI?
